name: Sherbert In A Bottle
description:
Sherbert In A Bottle is a short Visual Novel about wrestling with decisions relating to one's life path, and the positive impact online friends can have on a person.

Story:

<--- Meet Sherbert.  ("Sherb" for short.)

Sherbert's a Grand Mage that's having a hard time with his future and what he wants out of it.

He's opened up an inter-dimensional portal and the other end of it is you, the player! 

With your help, he can gain a little bit of clarity and feel more secure in his decisions.

Features:

✿  ~5k words

✿  3 endings

✿  ~ 15 minutes of gameplay

✿ 1920 x 1080 resolution

It's been a while since my last visual novel and after playing enough small, cute visual novels, I decided to try making my own. I wanted to test myself and see how a project with a far smaller scope'd fare.

Inspired by (But became a project absolutely not sticking to the guidelines of) the O2A2VN Jam! 

Currently a sort of weird WIP- 0.9 being the trimmed down (but complete) release, with plans to update and add a few more tidbits for a full 1.0 version.

I hope you enjoy it!

Credits: 

Art + Story - Ekkoberry

Music -  https://wowsound.com/

NOTE: 

The game intentionally closes at certain points in the story. This is not a bug, just reopen and click start to continue.
